name: Pahelika: Revelations HD
description: Pahelika: Revelations is the quintessential Fantasy Adventure, focussing on Exploration & Puzzle solving. Set in an alternate reality where magic co-exists with science, Pahelika: Revelations takes you on the fantastical quest undertaken by Sudesh Budkoti, the protagonist of the Pahelika series.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: It was nice in the beginning but the story is boring and the clicking is buggy most of the time especially on the portal.
played it much longer than most point and click games.
